: : Lunekill/Kup/Rodimus Prime : :

Lunekill could only look in horror as she watched her brother explode.

Lunekill: ROCKSEEKER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Meanwhile Rodimus observes what mental strain terminating another life has put on his wife. He wants to comfort her but before he can he must be the commander he is.

Rodimus stands up so all the Maximals can hear him.

Rodimus Prime: Maximals, there is one left. We now know where to hit them. TAKE HER DOWN!

Kup takes aim, firing at Lunekill's central fusion core.

Rodimus gets back down, taking hold of his trembling wife.

Rodimus Prime: Nightlight, I know how you feel but it's ok, you helped save us...


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
As Nightlight shot her energy balls, Rockseeker spun about and armed 
his Radiant Rifle.

He targeted the base, hoping to disarm the shields, then unleashed 
his attack as the energy balls approached him. Everything connected.

His central fusion core was hit by Nightlight's fire and he exploded 
few seconds after. His frame became a puzzle of half-fried pieces of 
metal, his processors were utterly destroyed and his spark imploded, 
creating a massive blast on the battlefield.

Rockseeker was dead.

However, his last move was not in vain. The Radiant shot damaged the 
shields greatly, and his death implosion further eroded them.

Inside the base, Yggdrasil had to cover his optics as he saw the 
monitor reporting the events. He was overwhelmed by joy as he 
realized one of the attacker had perished... until he saw the base 
status report.

Yggdrasil: Holy slag! That can't be! What did that guy shoot with? 
(he opens a commline to all maximals) Maximals, this is Yggdrasil. 
We've lost the shields and taken heavy structural damage to the base! 
Either you drive that last one away, or we're scrapped next time it 
fires!

Indeed, the exterior of the base was now partly melted, sometimes 
pierced, but the part that had been exposed to the explosion was now 
severely mauled, 4 turrets gone with the armor plating.

<DIV><STRONG>: : Lunekill/Kup/Rodimus Prime : :</STRONG></DIV>
<P>Lunekill could only look in horror as she watched her brother explode.</P>
<P><STRONG>Lunekill: </STRONG>ROCKSEEKER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!</P>
<P>Meanwhile Rodimus observes what mental strain terminating another life has put on his wife. He wants to comfort her but before he can he must be the commander he is.</P>
<P>Rodimus stands up so all the Maximals can hear him.</P>
<P><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: </STRONG>Maximals, there is one left. We now know where to hit them. TAKE HER DOWN!</P>
<P>Kup takes aim, firing at Lunekill's central fusion core.</P>
<P>Rodimus gets back down, taking hold of his trembling wife.</P>
<P><STRONG>Rodimus Prime: </STRONG>Nightlight, I know how you feel but it's ok, you helped save us...</P>
